positionCreate.auctionDuration: Auction duration must be greater than 1 month.

collateralAddress.notSupported: Token decimals should be less than 24.

initialCollateral.greaterThanZero: Initial collateral must be greater than 0.
initialCollateral.greaterThanMinimum: Initial collateral must be greater than the minimum amount.

initPeriod.min: Initialization period must be greater than 5 days.

interest.min: Annual Interest Rate should be greater than 0%.
interest.max: Annual Interest Rate should be less than 100%.

liqPrice.min: Liquidation value of the collateral must be at least 3500 OFD.
